title: JGit and EGit do not notify about ConfigChangedEvent when editing git config from console
abstract:
When i run something like 
git remote add fj https://github.com/git-test4/.git

I expect ConfigChanged listeners to be notified (the ones which are specified in org.eclipse.egit.core.RepositoryCache.RepositoryCache(String, int)
 and 
org.eclipse.egit.core.RepositoryHandle.addListeners(List<ListenerHandle>, ListenerList, WeakReference<RepositoryHandle>) for example). 

But for now this type of event is fired only when some operations with org.eclipse.jgit.lib.Config inside Eclipse are made (Config class has fireConfigChangedEvent()). 

I want to make some validator functions which validate Config settings when it's modified (specifically .git file). But Eclipse simply doesn't register this event when it'd done via console git client.

title: Avoid packaging jetty bundles already packaged by the Platform
abstract:
DescriptionNitin Dahyabhai CLA Friend 2022-09-29 00:58:13 EDT
The Platform builds *some* of the Jetty bundles we use for our Preview Servers. While having bundles built and signed by both the Platform and WTP haven't presented issues before, this should be cleaned up

title: NPE in org.eclipse.wst.sse.ui.internal.projection.AbstractStructuredFoldingStrategy.getIndexedRegions()
abstract:
Exception in thread "org.eclipse.wst.sse.ui.internal.reconcile.StructuredRegionProcessor" java.lang.NullPointerException: Cannot invoke "org.eclipse.wst.sse.core.internal.provisional.IndexedRegion.getEndOffset()" because "indexedRegion" is null
	at org.eclipse.wst.sse.ui.internal.projection.AbstractStructuredFoldingStrategy.getIndexedRegions(AbstractStructuredFoldingStrategy.java:507)
	at org.eclipse.wst.sse.ui.internal.projection.AbstractStructuredFoldingStrategy.reconcile(AbstractStructuredFoldingStrategy.java:179)
	at org.eclipse.wst.sse.ui.internal.reconcile.DocumentRegionProcessor.process(DocumentRegionProcessor.java:332)
	at org.eclipse.wst.sse.ui.internal.reconcile.StructuredRegionProcessor.process(StructuredRegionProcessor.java:260)
	at org.eclipse.wst.sse.ui.internal.reconcile.DirtyRegionProcessor$BackgroundThread.run(DirtyRegionProcessor.java:694
